column4: Guild Holdings Company, through its subsidiary, originates, sells, and services residential mortgage loans in the United States. The company operates in two segments, Origination and Servicing. It is involved in loan origination, and acquisition and sale activities; servicing activities, including collection and remittance of loan payments, managing borrower's impound accounts for taxes and insurance, loan payoffs, loss mitigation, and foreclosure activities. Guild Holdings Company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in San Diego, California.
